1.12.2.0.1.3: Added JEI recipe tabs for Anvil and Mechanical Anvil
1.12.2.0.1.9: Added dungeon loot, poke chest loot, pokemon drops, pokemon boss drops and shop keeper items support.
1.12.2.0.2.1: Added pokemon description and type match-ups to tooltip.
1.12.2.0.2.2: Added pokemon description, pokedex number, type information and caught status to Waila.
1.12.2.0.2.3: Added additional tooltips and information text.
1.12.2.0.2.4: Added gender and generation to the WAILA output
1.12.2.0.2.5: Fixed the setting names and descriptions.
1.12.2.0.2.6: Fixed exception when populating the Pokemon Name in Waila header.
1.12.2.0.2.7: Fixed localisation of pokemon species name. Added Boss name, nickname and owner name.
1.12.2.0.2.8: Added Pokemon Level, fixed bug when hosting via LAN.
1.12.2.0.2.9: Added additional tooltips and information text. Fixed crash when WAILA mod not installed.
1.12.2.0.3.0:
Implement The One Probe.
Added config option to show Waila and The One Probe information only when sneaking.
1.12.2.0.3.1:
Fixed the Caught information in WAILA and The One Probe.
Added config option to show/hide the Shift Information in the tooltip.
